forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: s.s.s.b.r.

comments.text: my first community project did pretty well. a lot of people joined and contributed with 'minimal' lag.
i think this has been an important learning experiance for me on how community builds can develop and what to expect. although i'm not too certain on how i could improve drasticly.
people wont build what you have in mind. everyone is at different skill levels with different styles. although being too restrictive can disscourage people from joining in.
people will be unlikely to see their build through to the end. being supportive can help but don't get frustrated if things get left unfinished.
contruct is more or less finished. i don't intend to add more that isn't extra. have yet to get the board thing to work.
most is done and finished by this time. most was abandoned but some people returned once i did a few days ago. i would like to add more but its getting really lagy each time i join
i understand that everything is best left alone, it was an experiance and a nice memory of what everyone involved wanted to make in my area. i can be happy with what it is.

thread.latestCommentText: i understand that everything is best left alone, it was an experiance and a nice memory of what everyone involved wanted to make in my area. i can be happy with what it is.
